response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $1,500,000, while still allowing me to recoup a significant portion of its cost. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
